pullrequest.title: Proposal: Updating to Visual Studio 2017 and improving Windows CI

content.raw: Note that one of the crucial changes being proposed here is that we use append a workspace-local `install` directory along with its `bin`, `lib`, `share`, and `include` subdirectories to a temporary `PATH` environment variable that will be used while building and running the job. This gives us a set of convenient places to dump all our binary and header dependencies without needing to worry about manually specifying those paths to cmake or copying the binaries into the test directories.
